info.title: Get SEC Filings Data
info.description: Fetches up to the latest 10-Q filings for a public company. Uses alias mapping, fuzzy matching, and CIK resolution. Validates HTML URLs with HEAD + GET fallback. Returns filings in descending order by date, defaulting to 2.

get.description: Returns the most recent 10-Q filings for a public company. Includes validated HTML URLs and supports count param (default: 2, min: 1, max: 4).

parameters.name: company_name
parameters.description: Public company name or ticker (e.g., Apple, AAPL, Meta, RH).

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Optional. Number of most recent 10-Q filings to return (default is 2, max is 4).

Matched Company Name.description: Resolved company name using alias and fuzzy matching.

CIK.description: SEC Central Index Key for the matched company.

10-Q Filings.description: A list of the latest 10-Q reports with filing dates and HTML URLs.

HTML Report.description: Validated URL to the HTML version of the 10-Q report.

Status.description: Validation status of the HTML report URL.

DisplayIndex.description: Emoji-style numeric label for GPT UI display.

Marker.description: Indicates whether the filing is most recent or older.

404.description: Company not found or no filings available
